statements: SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring WHERE id = 1;
SELECT measurement_name, measurement_value FROM performance_monitoring WHERE measurement_value > 100;
SELECT id, measurement_name, timestamp FROM performance_monitoring WHERE measurement_name LIKE '%memory%';
SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';
SELECT measurement_name, measurement_value FROM performance_monitoring ORDER BY measurement_value DESC;
SELECT measurement_name, measurement_value FROM performance_monitoring WHERE measurement_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT measurement_name, measurement_value, timestamp FROM performance_monitoring WHERE measurement_name LIKE 'CPU%' ORDER BY measurement_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY measurement_value DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT measurement_name, MAX(measurement_value) AS max_measurement FROM performance_monitoring GROUP BY measurement_name HAVING max_measurement > 500 ORDER BY max_measurement DESC;
SELECT measurement_name, AVG(measurement_value) AS average_value FROM performance_monitoring GROUP BY measurement_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring_data;
SELECT metric_name FROM performance_monitoring_data ORDER BY metric_name ASC;
SELECT metric_value FROM performance_monitoring_data WHERE metric_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, message FROM performance_monitoring_logs WHERE log_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring_data WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_monitoring_data ORDER BY metric_name DESC;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_monitoring_data WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, LEFT(message, 50) AS short_message FROM performance_monitoring_logs WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(message) > 50 ORDER BY log_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT metric_name, timestamp, value FROM performance_monitoring_table WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT DISTINCT metric_name FROM performance_metrics
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_as_a_service WHERE provider_name = 'AWS'
SELECT provider_name, region, cost FROM infrastructure_as_a_service ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT metric_name, value FROM performance_monitoring_table WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_description LIKE 'CPU%'
SELECT provider_name, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM infrastructure_as_a_service GROUP BY provider_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT region, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM infrastructure_as_a_service GROUP BY region HAVING avg_cost > 500
SELECT * FROM performance_monitoring;
SELECT server_name, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM performance_monitoring;
SELECT server_name, disk_space FROM performance_monitoring WHERE cpu_usage > 70;
SELECT * FROM server_information ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT report_date, server_id, cpu_usage FROM performance_reports WHERE cpu_usage < 30 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT server_name, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM performance_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM performance_logs WHERE server_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_name, location FROM server_information WHERE hardware = 'Intel';
SELECT report_date, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM performance_reports WHERE cpu_usage > 80 AND disk_space < 50;
SELECT DISTINCT server_name, server_id FROM performance_monitoring ORDER BY server_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY metric_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT MAX(usage_value) AS max_usage_value FROM ResourceUsage;
SELECT report_name, generated_time FROM ReportData WHERE generated_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY generated_time DESC;
SELECT error_message, error_time FROM ErrorLogs ORDER BY error_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT metric_name, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT resource_name, AVG(usage_value) AS avg_usage FROM ResourceUsage GROUP BY resource_name;
